text: "The Hardest Button to Button" is a 2003 song by American rock duo The White Stripes. It is from their fourth studio album Elephant. It went to number 23 in the United Kingdom, number 42 in Ireland and number 54 in Australia. It was used in The Simpsons episode Jazzy and the Pussycats. ==Track listings== UK and Australasian CD single # "The Hardest Button to Button" # "St. Ides of March" # "The Hardest Button to Button" (video) UK 7-inch single :A. "The Hardest Button to Button" (Jack White) :B. "St. Ides of March" ==References== Category:2003 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:The White Stripes songs Category:Garage rock songs
title: The Hardest Button to Button
